item.title: Valentine's Day 2023 home decor tips: Here's how to transform your house on V-Day
item.description: This Valentine's Day 2023, you can transform your home into a cosy little cottage with just a few tweaks in its furniture and accessories to create a magical place for your partner right at home. Here are some tips by home decor and interior design experts

item.title: Tribal woman revives vanishing traditional Gujjar Jammu and Kashmir apparel
item.description: A Kashmiri tribal woman is preserving dying culture by sewing, designing, and embroidering traditional Gujjar Jammu and Kashmir clothing.
